B

bankBalance - Variable in class sdds.lab1.task2.Craps
bankBalance in a private int data member that is initialized to 1000 for every instance since that's the balance that each player holds when they first start playing the game.

C

chatter() - Method in class sdds.lab1.task2.Craps
chatter function creates an array of String messages that are displayed everytime the user either wins or loses the game.
Craps - Class in sdds.lab1.task2
Craps class contains multiple functions that let the user play the Craps game interactively.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class sdds.lab1.task2.TestCraps
main function initializes a Craps object so that the user can play the game after initialization.

R

rollAndPlay() - Method in class sdds.lab1.task2.Craps
rollAndPlay function rolls a die by randomly picking a number between 1 and 6.

S

sdds.lab1.task2 - package sdds.lab1.task2
 

T

TestCraps - Class in sdds.lab1.task2
TestCraps class contains a main function that creates a Craps instance and calls wager function on that instance that performs the action of playing the Craps casino game.

W

wager() - Method in class sdds.lab1.task2.Craps
wager function asks for a user input to check the bank balance of the user.
